author: cbs8
title: Denver Marriott West Makes Some Noise With Book Early And Save Package
text:
Denver Marriott West
Hotel near Red Rocks Amphitheatre offers low rates starting at just $119 per night Thursday through Sunday from now through Oct. 9, 2015
GOLDEN, Colo. , Aug. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Concert-goers heading to Red Rocks Amphitheatre this fall will find the low rates at Denver Marriott West music to their ears.
No matter what shows they plan on attending, travelers will be rocking out with plenty of savings when they book a stay at one of the premier hotels in Golden, CO. With the Book Early and Save Package , guests can enjoy rates starting at just $119 a night Thursday through Sunday. Available through Oct. 9, 2015 , this deal is the perfect excuse to spur some fun this season.
Denver Marriott West is just 7 miles from Red Rocks Amphitheatre , making it the perfect retreat for music lovers visiting the only naturally occurring acoustically perfect amphitheater in the world. Surrounded by 868 acres of deer, dinosaur fossils, pines, geological wonders and spectacular vista views, concert-goers will quickly understand why artists from around the world aspire to grace the breathtaking stage.
August travelers will find a variety of shows to jam out to, no matter what genre they enjoy. Crowds will flock to Reggae on the Rocks on Aug. 22, 2015 , featuring a variety of bands including Sublime with Rome , Pepper, Third World and the Wailing Souls, while hip-hop lovers make some noise for J. Cole and Big Sean on Aug. 25, 2015 .
In September, the incredible venue will be welcoming Tim McGraw , Billy Currington and Chase Bryant , on Sep. 9-10, 2015 . Additional chart-topping names set to take the stage that month include Counting Crows, Ben Harper , Duran Duran and Panic at the Disco.
Following an exciting night on the rocks, tired travelers can refuel at Copper Creek . Serving up breakfast, lunch and dinner infused with Colorado -inspired ingredients, the stylish eatery invites guests to indulge in mouthwatering meals without leaving the hotel. After a meal, grab a signature cocktail from the chic bar and continue socializing by the fire.
Concert-goers nursing leftover energy from the show can take a relaxing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool. A state-of-the-art fitness center is also available for those craving a workout. It features a variety of free weights and cardiovascular equipment with personal TV screens connected.
To take advantage of the Book Early and Save Package, make reservations online or by calling 1-800-228-9290 and using promotional code ADV.
About Denver Marriott West
Denver Marriott West at 1717 Denver West Blvd. in Golden, CO is near Red Rocks Amphitheatre, Miller Coors Brewery and Colorado Mills Mall. The hotel features 6 floors with 303 rooms, 2 suites, 16 meeting rooms with 12,300 square feet of event space, 2 concierge levels, a restaurant, Starbucks, fitness center, indoor pool and outdoor pool. For information, visit www.marriott.com/DENWE or call 1-303-279-9100.
Join Marriott Rewards now and earn points that can be redeemed for free hotel stays and room upgrades at 3,800 hotels in over 70 countries.
